name: C4 Senora Sanitary Napkin (Panty)
description:
The word ‘sanitary’ means clean or hygienic. So that’s exactly what a sanitary napkin does or should do – take care of the menstrual flow in a safe, hygienic way. Senora Regular offers advanced and full absorbency protection to women. The extra-long Senora XL ensures full protection from dryness for long hours. So step ahead girls, without worrying about leakage ever. Senora is committed to ensuring health and hygiene for women- once they are free from worrying about health they can achieve all other things they want in life. Ingredients: Air-laid paper, PE Film, Sterilized pulp, Non-woven Fabric, HMA & Silicon Release Paper.

name: Veet Pure Hair Removal Cream Normal Skin With Cucumber Extract
description:
Current Promotional Period: 19-Feb-2025 To 18-Mar-2025*Based on Stock**It might not be valid for all Cities Highlights ● Your 5-minute salon: Get smooth, moisturized, and exfoliated skin in just 3-6 minutes● Freshest smell: No more ammonia smell, thanks to the removal of the ingredients causing it● Removes shortest of hair: Removes short hair from legs, arms, underarms, and bikini line● Long-lasting smoothness: Enriched with cucumber extracts for long-lasting smoothness● Safe on Skin: Dermatologically tested and leaves skin moisturized for up to 24 hours● Easy to use: Comes with a spatula for easy application● Available in 25gm, 50gm & 100gm DescriptionGet smooth skin and the freedom to wear any look, any time with Veet. Veet Pure Hair Removal Cream for Normal Skin, enriched with cucumber extracts, is the right solution when going to the salon is not an option. It effectively removes even short stubborn hair and leaves skin moisturized for up to 24 hours*. It can be used on legs, arms, bikini lines, and underarms for salon-like smoothness. Veet Pure Hair Removal Cream for Normal Skin gives you perfect hair removal results in just 3 to 6 minutes. Follow the steps mentioned on the pack using the spatula provided. Before using the product, please read the pack precautions carefully. With regular use; get fewer, finer, and softer hair growing back! How to Use: 1) Apply a thick layer with a spatula to fully coat the hair, do not rub it in; 2) Leave it on for 3 minutes** strictly not to be used beyond 6 minutes; 3) Remove with a spatula & rinse with water thoroughly and then dry. Safety Measures: Before every use, test your skin reaction by applying and removing the product over 5 sq cm of your skin on the inner elbow. If after 24 hours, there is no adverse reaction, continue to use. If you experience any smarting/tingling during use, remove the product immediately and rinse thoroughly with cold water. If a burning sensation persists, seek medical advice. Always leave 72 hours between removal sessions. About the Manufacturer: Veet is a brand of Reckitt Benckiser Group PLC. Veet is the number 1 depilatory brand in the world. Veet products in Bangladesh are manufactured in India and marketed in Bangladesh by Reckitt Benckiser Bangladesh Limited.
Current Promotional Period: 19-Feb-2025 To 18-Mar-2025

Highlights
 
● Your 5-minute salon: Get smooth, moisturized, and exfoliated skin in just 3-6 minutes
● Freshest smell: No more ammonia smell, thanks to the removal of the ingredients causing it
● Removes shortest of hair: Removes short hair from legs, arms, underarms, and bikini line
● Long-lasting smoothness: Enriched with cucumber extracts for long-lasting smoothness

Description
Get smooth skin and the freedom to wear any look, any time with Veet. Veet Pure Hair Removal Cream for Normal Skin, enriched with cucumber extracts, is the right solution when going to the salon is not an option. It effectively removes even short stubborn hair and leaves skin moisturized for up to 24 hours*. It can be used on legs, arms, bikini lines, and underarms for salon-like smoothness. Veet Pure Hair Removal Cream for Normal Skin gives you perfect hair removal results in just 3 to 6 minutes. Follow the steps mentioned on the pack using the spatula provided. Before using the product, please read the pack precautions carefully. With regular use; get fewer, finer, and softer hair growing back!
 
How to Use: 1) Apply a thick layer with a spatula to fully coat the hair, do not rub it in; 2) Leave it on for 3 minutes** strictly not to be used beyond 6 minutes; 3) Remove with a spatula & rinse with water thoroughly and then dry.
 
Safety Measures: Before every use, test your skin reaction by applying and removing the product over 5 sq cm of your skin on the inner elbow. If after 24 hours, there is no adverse reaction, continue to use. If you experience any smarting/tingling during use, remove the product immediately and rinse thoroughly with cold water. If a burning sensation persists, seek medical advice. Always leave 72 hours between removal sessions.
 
About the Manufacturer: Veet is a brand of Reckitt Benckiser Group PLC. Veet is the number 1 depilatory brand in the world. Veet products in Bangladesh are manufactured in India and marketed in Bangladesh by Reckitt Benckiser Bangladesh Limited.

name: SS3 Shokhi Sanitary Napkin (Panty)
description:
Shokhi Sanitary Napkin is designed to provide high absorbency, super comfort, and protection from infection during menstruation. Available in both belt and panty type, the advanced features of the Shokhi Sanitary Napkin include an ADL Strip, Air-Laid Paper, Gel Technology, Cottony Soft Top Layer, PE Film Back Sheet, and UV Sterilization which ensures tension-free hygiene and leakage-free comfort during menstruation.
Shokhi Sanitary Napkin is designed to provide high absorbency, super comfort, and protection from infection during menstruation. name: Veet Easy Gel Bikini & Underarm Wax Strips Normal Skin
description:
Current Promotional Period: 19-Feb-2025 To 18-Mar-2025*Based on Stock**It might not be valid for all Cities Highlights  • Box contains 16 One-Side Strips (2 Strips Patched Together X 8) & 3 Perfect Finish Wipes  • Removes hair from the root Easy grip technology helps you get rid of even 1.5mm short hair.  • Clinically proven up to 28 days of smoothness  • Specially designed for bikini line and underarms  • Dermatologically Tested suitable for all skin types  • with Acai berry fragrance  • Specially formulated with Shea Butter, known for its moisturizing properties  • Available in Normal & Sensitive variants    Description  Gives confidence to achieve great 1st time results, even for those inexperienced with wax strips. The strip is specially designed for areas like bikini line and underarms. Also applicable for Legs, Body, Upper Lips, Cheeks, and Chin. Contains Shea Butter known for its moisturizing properties. Get silky-smooth skin and the freedom to wear any look, any time with Veet. Veet ready-to-use wax strips is the perfect solution when going to the parlor is not an option. These Easy-Gel strips effectively pull out as short as 1.5 mm short hair, giving you up to 28 days of lasting smoothness and instantly exfoliated skin, at the comfort of your home or on-the-go. Just follow 3 simple steps: Peel-Apply-Pull. These wax strips are great for instant use and do not require heating, which means no mess! Use the perfect finishing wipes provided with each pack for easy cleaning, post-use.  How to Use: 1) Slowly Peel the strips apart using the outwards rounded tabs. 2) On bikini: bend your leg outwards. Place a strip on your skin and rub repeatedly in the direction of hair growth. On underarm: hair tends to grow in two different directions: the upper part upwards, and the lower part downwards, so make sure you wax this area in 2 stages. Put one hand behind your head and stretch your arm back to hold your skin taut, lift the elbow up and well back to tighten the skin. Place a strip onto one half of the underarm and rub repeatedly in the direction of hair growth (away from the centre of underarm). 3) Hold tab. Hold skin taut. Pull strip back on itself AS FAST AS YOU CAN! In one swift motion close to the skin as you pull. 4) After waxing, clean away any wax left on your skin with a Perfect Finish Wipe.   Safety Measures: Before using Veet Wax Strips, please read pack precautions carefully. Before every use, test your skin reaction by applying and removing the product to a small part of the area you wish to treat, following the directions for use. If a burning sensation persists, seek medical advice. Keep out of reach of children. Store any remaining strips in a cool dry place.  About the Manufacturer: Veet is a trademark of Reckitt Benckiser PLC. Veet is the number 1 depilatory brand in the world. Veet Wax Strips are made in France and imported and marketed in Bangladesh by Reckitt Benckiser (Bangladesh) PLC.

Before using the product, please read the pack precautions carefully. With regular use; get fewer, finer, and softer hair growing back!    How to Use : 1) Apply a thick layer with spatula to fully coat the hair, do not rub it in; 2) Leave it on for 3 minutes** strictly not to be used beyond 6 minutes; 3) Remove with spatula & rinse with water thoroughly and then dry. Safety Measures: Before every use, test your skin reaction by applying and removing the product over 5 sq cm of your skin on the inner elbow. If after 24 hours, there is no adverse reaction, continue to use. If you experience any smarting/tingling during use, remove the product immediately and rinse thoroughly with cold water. If a burning sensation persists, seek medical advice. Always leave 72 hours between removal sessions. About the Manufacturer: Veet is a brand of Reckitt Benckiser Group PLC. Veet is the number 1 depilatory brand in the world. Veet products in Bangladesh are manufactured in India and marketed in Bangladesh by Reckitt Benckiser Bangladesh Limited.

Highlights
● Your 5-minute salon: Get smooth, moisturized, and exfoliated skin in just 3-6 minutes

Description
Get smooth skin and the freedom to wear any look, any time with Veet. Veet Pure Hair Removal Cream for Normal Skin, enriched with cucumber extracts, is the right solution when going to the salon is not an option. It effectively removes even short stubborn hair and leaves skin moisturized for up to 24 hours*. It can be used on legs, arms, bikini lines,s, and underarms for salon-like smoothness. Veet Pure Hair Removal Cream for Normal Skin gives you perfect hair removal results in just 3 to 6 minutes. Follow the steps mentioned on the pack using the spatula provided. Before using the product, please read the pack precautions carefully. With regular use; get fewer, finer, and softer hair growing back!
How to Use: 1) Apply a thick layer with a spatula to fully coat the hair, do not rub it in; 2) Leave it on for 3 minutes** strictly not to be used beyond 6 minutes; 3) Remove with spatula & rinse with water thoroughly and then dry.
Safety Measures: Before every use, test your skin reaction by applying and removing the product over 5 sq cm of your skin on the inner elbow. If after 24 hours, there is no adverse reaction, continue to use. If you experience any smarting/tingling during use, remove the product immediately and rinse thoroughly with cold water. If a burning sensation persists, seek medical advice. Always leave 72 hours between removal sessions.
About the Manufacturer: Veet is a brand of Reckitt Benckiser Group PLC. Veet is the number 1 depilatory brand in the world. Veet products in Bangladesh are manufactured in India and marketed in Bangladesh by Reckitt Benckiser Bangladesh Limited.

name: Sirona Pee Buddy Female Urination Device
description:
PROBLEM Restriction to pee due to dirty public toilets and inability to squat because of joint pain, pregnancy, etc. can make life troublesome. It can lead to dehydration and holding in pee for a prolonged period. This can result in UTI. SOLUTION PeeBuddy, India's 1st female urination device, is a practical portable, and disposable solution to unshackle you from these problems. It empowers you with the Freedom to Stand and Pee so that you can commute, take road trips, or even trek without any worries.

name: F2 Senora Confidence Teen Sanitary Napkin 8 pads
description:
Wellness is the most desired thing to any girl that needs to be shielded. Therefore, our one & only endeavor is to empower girls so that they can ensure ‘Self-Care’ of themselves. Getting the first period is a milestone in a girl’s life as it marks the start of her journey as a woman. It comes with full of surprises, little bit of anxiety, and excitement of embarking on a new journey. Here comes Senora Confidence Teen specially designed for teenagers to make this natural cycle of their life blissful and comfortable. Odor Lock Technology prevents the bad odour to be spread.  Little Woman, Grow Up with Confidence!
